title: Converse Rubber Tracks - disCOVERed: Ernest Rose covers "Black Horse & The Cherry Tree"
description:
Fashion and music are constantly reinvented when artists pay homage by "covering" classic pieces. So, for Fashion's Night Out 2012, Converse commissioned new interpretations of classic songs.

"Black Horse & The Cherry Tree" was written and made famous by KT Tunstall. Ernest Rose gave this classic song a modern makeover when he visited Converse Rubber Tracks studio to record his soulful arrangement.

To learn more about Converse Rubber Tracks visit: http://www.converse.com/rubbertracks/

"BLACK HORSE & THE CHERRY TREE"
WRITTEN BY KATIE TUNSTALL
(C) 2004 SONY/ATV MUSIC PUBLISHING UK LTD.
